bwapi

Class BWClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • bwapi.BWClient

  • public class BWClient
extends Object
    Client class to connect to the game with.

      • BWClient

        public BWClient(BWEventListener eventListener)

    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()
        Get the Game instance of the currently running game. When running in asynchronous mode, this is the game from the bot's perspective, eg. potentially a previous frame.

      • getPerformanceMetrics

        public PerformanceMetrics getPerformanceMetrics()
        Returns:
        JBWAPI performance metrics.

      • getConfiguration

        public BWClientConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Returns:
        The current configuration

      • framesBehind

        public int framesBehind()
        Returns:
        The number of frames between the one exposed to the bot and the most recent received by JBWAPI. This tracks the size of the frame buffer except when the game is paused (which results in multiple frames arriving with the same count).

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Start the game with default settings.

      • startGame

        @Deprecated
public void startGame(boolean autoContinue)
        Deprecated. 
        Start the game.
        Parameters:
        autoContinue - automatically continue playing the next game(s). false by default

      • startGame

        public void startGame(BWClientConfiguration gameConfiguration)
        Start the game.
        Parameters:
        gameConfiguration - Settings for playing games with this client.
